message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I'm aiming for a more equitable split this time, Alice. Let's make a deal.
Bob, time is running out and the money is losing value. My offer is still the best deal you'll get.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm willing to compromise, but this offer is my bottom line.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before the money is worth even less for both of us!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution.  Let's end this.
